comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of motion activated machines
- y: number of manual machines

Definitions:
- x: number of motion activated machines to be bought
- y: number of manual machines to be bought

Extracted Constraints:
- x \geq 3: at least 3 motion activated machines should be bought
- y \leq 0.4(x+y): at most 40% of the machines can be manual
- 50x + 75y \geq 1000: the mall must be able to deliver at least 1000 drops per minute
- 30x + 20y \leq 500: the mall can use at most 500 kWh per minute

Objective:
- Minimize Z = x + y: minimize the total number of machines to be bought
